mapper.select: select m.gname "name",a.nums "value" from (select *, count(useraccount) 'nums' from recordgood group by gid order by count(useraccount) desc limit 10) a left join milk m on a.gid = m.gid and m.tag = 1;

select m.gname "name",if(nums is null,0,nums) "value" from milk m left join (select r.gid, count(useraccount) "nums" from recordgood r group by gid) a on m.gid = a.gid and m.tag = 1 where 1=1
and m.gcid = #{gcid}

select m.gname "name",sum(nums) "value" from (select *,count(gid) 'nums' from goodsrate where rate >= 4 group by gid,rate) a,milk m where a.gid = m.gid and m.tag = 1 group by a.gid order by value desc limit 6
